title: "5 Times Startup Founders Might Need To Say No"
excerpt: "When asked what the critical factor for a successful startup is, I always answer, “The ability to say, ‘No.’” This is an integral part of any founder’s job description. Getting caught up in time-consuming tasks that won’t deliver results or pivoting for short-term cash flow are horrible mistakes I’ve made because I wasn’t bold enough to simply say no."
